div.p: This element is found within expressed, tagg it as BIOGRAPHY PERSONNAME . es, is an element that contains an individual piece of tabular information. Any further information that is written in a full sentence must be placed in a P element (within SHORTPROSE or SCHOLARNOTE). A DATAITEM is always contained within a DATASTRUCT element.

Open a new DATAITEM for each discrete piece of tabular information. For example, the contents of a MARRIED element (in PERSONNAME) might look as follows: <DATASTRUCT><DATAITEM><MARRIED>Ward</MARREIED></DATAITEM> <DATAITEM><MARRIED>Smith</MARRIED></DATAITEM></DATASTRUCT>
If this section contains an in-line xml example, use , with the same instructions as above for codeblock.
